Text: Kevin Garland Joins The Sterling Grouppst Announcement Kevin Garland has joined the Sterling Group as a Principal Kevin spent the last years at Enron where he most recently was Managing Director in charge of Enrons private equity business Since its founding in Sterling has focused on making equity investments in LBO transactions and other acquisitionrelated financings primarily in industrial operating businesses Sterling has sponsored the buyouts of companies and addon acquisitions for a total transaction value of billion Kevin joins the other Principals of Sterling Frank Hevrdejs William Oehmig Hunter Nelson and John Hawkins who have a combined years at the firm Contact Information Kevin Garland Principal The Sterling Group Eight Greenway Plaza Houston Texas Work Phone Cell Phone
